Use No Clocks <meta>

use_noclocks_meta.Rd

Adds <meta> tags and social media cards for No Clocks, LLC.

Usage

use_noclocks_meta(
  name = "noclocks",
  version = "0.0.1",
  description = "<meta> and social media cards for No Clocks, LLC",
  url = "https://noclocks.dev",
  theme_color = "#000000",
  robots = "index,follow",
  generator = "R-Shiny",
  subject = "No Clocks, LLC",
  rating = "General",
  referrer = "origin",
  csp = "default-src 'self'",
  image = noclocks_logo(url = TRUE),
  image_alt = "No Clocks, LLC Logo",
  twitter_creator = "@noclocksdev",
  twitter_card_type = "summary_large_image",
  twitter_site = "@noclocksdev",
  ...
)

Arguments

name

(character) The name of the site

version

(character) The version of the site

description

(character) The description of the site

url

(character) The URL of the site

theme_color

(character) The theme color of the site

robots

(character) The robots meta tag

generator

(character) The generator meta tag

subject

(character) The subject meta tag

rating

(character) The rating meta tag

referrer

(character) The referrer meta tag

csp

(character) The content security policy meta tag

image

(character) The image URL for the site

image_alt

(character) The image alt text for the site

twitter_creator

(character) The Twitter creator meta tag

twitter_card_type

(character) The Twitter card type meta tag

twitter_site

(character) The Twitter site meta tag

...

Additional arguments

Value

HTML via htmltools::tags() and <meta> tags via metathis::meta()

See also

metathis::meta()

Examples

if (FALSE) {

  shiny::fluidPage(
    use_noclocks_meta()
  )

}
